import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./oneUser.css" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { faLock , faLockOpen , faPen , faTrash} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import UpdateModal from '../OverView/UpdateModal'; const OneUser = (props) => { const [block,setBlocked] = useState(props.user.is_active) const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false); const handleOpenUpdate = () => setOpen(true); const handleCloseUpdate = () => setOpen(false); const handleBlock = () => { setBlocked(!block) } return (
{props.user.nom+" "+props.user.prenom}
{props.user.cin}
{( block && true )?{handleBlock()}}/> : {handleBlock()}} /> }
) } export default OneUser
